messages.content: What is the purpose of the DTAIComfyPromptAgent script?
The script provides a prompt agent node for the Comfy UI stable diffusion client.
What is the prerequisite to use this script?
Before using this script, you need to import it into the custom nodes directory of your Comfy UI client.
What is the file that contains the required python dependencies for this script?
The file 'requirements.txt' contains the required python dependencies for this script.
Which license does this project use?
This project is licensed under the MIT License.
What type of client can this script be added to?
This script is an optional add-on for the Comfy UI stable diffusion client.
